patthana1.6:1.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.6:2.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesike khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.6:3.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana1.6:3.1_1: dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ.
patthana1.6:4.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana1.6:4.1_1: dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana1.6:4.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana1.6:4.1_3: dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ;
patthana1.6:4.1_4: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca khandhā;
patthana1.6:4.1_6: mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ.
patthana1.6:5.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.6:6.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesike khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.6:7.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana1.6:7.1_1: dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ.
patthana1.6:8.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikañca asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesike khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.6:9.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikañca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesike khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.6:10.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā nava, anantare tīṇi, samanantare tīṇi, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye nava, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme nava, vipāke pañca, āhāre nava …pe…
patthana1.6:10.1_1: magge nava, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte nava …pe…
patthana1.6:12.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana1.6:13.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana1.6:15.1_0: Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā cha, naanantare pañca …pe…
patthana1.6:15.1_1: naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṁ …pe…
patthana1.6:15.1_2: namagge ekaṁ, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca.
patthana1.6:16.1_1: napurejāte satta, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca.
patthana1.6:17.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… magge ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana1.6:20.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:21.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:22.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa ca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:23.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana1.6:23.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:24.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:25.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:26.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa ca asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:27.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—rāgaṁ assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati, uddhaccaṁ uppajjati, domanassaṁ uppajjati.
patthana1.6:29.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti, saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesike khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, cetopariyañāṇena saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikacittasamaṅgissa cittaṁ jānanti;
patthana1.6:29.1_1: sekkhā vā puthujjanā vā saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesike khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, kusale niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati;
patthana1.6:29.1_3: domanassaṁ uppajjati, akusale niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati.
patthana1.6:29.1_4: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammupagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:30.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ datvā, sīlaṁ samādiyitvā, uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati;
patthana1.6:30.1_1: jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṁ paccavekkhati, ariyā gotrabhuṁ paccavekkhanti, vodānaṁ paccavekkhanti, cakkhuṁ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti; sotaṁ … ghānaṁ … jivhaṁ … kāyaṁ … rūpe … sadde … gandhe … rase …
patthana1.6:30.1_3: vatthuṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesike khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti;
patthana1.6:30.1_4: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passanti, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇanti, cetopariyañāṇena asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikacittasamaṅgissa cittaṁ jānanti.
patthana1.6:30.1_9: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:31.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ datvā, sīlaṁ samādiyitvā, uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ assādeti abhinandati;
patthana1.6:31.1_1: taṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati …pe…
patthana1.6:31.1_8: asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesike khandhe assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati …
patthana1.6:32.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—nibbānaṁ maggassa, phalassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:33.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti, phalaṁ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.6:33.1_1: Nibbānaṁ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:33.1_3: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:34.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana1.6:34.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—rāgaṁ garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati;
patthana1.6:34.1_2: diṭṭhiṁ garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.6:35.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:36.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa ca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:36.1_1: **Sahajātādhipati**—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:37.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana1.6:37.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—dānaṁ datvā, sīlaṁ samādiyitvā, uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati, sekkhā gotrabhuṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, vodānaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.6:37.1_2: **Sahajātādhipati**—asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:38.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:38.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—dānaṁ datvā, sīlaṁ samādiyitvā, uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, pubbe suciṇṇāni garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati …pe…
patthana1.6:38.1_2: jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṁ garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati …pe…
patthana1.6:38.1_5: vatthuṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesike khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.6:39.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana1.6:40.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana1.6:40.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, phalaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ gotrabhussa, vodānassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:41.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa ca asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:41.1_1: **Sahajātādhipati**—asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:42.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:43.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā khandhā vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:44.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:45.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—āvajjanā saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:46.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—gotrabhu maggassa …
patthana1.6:46.1_3: nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:47.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:48.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—phalaṁ vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:49.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.6:50.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.6:50.1_1: **Pakatūpanissayo**—rāgaṁ upanissāya dānaṁ deti, sīlaṁ samādiyati, uposathakammaṁ karoti, jhānaṁ …
patthana1.6:50.1_8: kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:50.1_9: Pāṇaṁ hantvā tassa paṭighātatthāya dānaṁ deti, sīlaṁ samādiyati, uposathakammaṁ karoti, jhānaṁ uppādeti, vipassanaṁ uppādeti, abhiññaṁ uppādeti, samāpattiṁ uppādeti …pe…
patthana1.6:50.1_10: saṅghaṁ bhinditvā tassa paṭighātatthāya dānaṁ deti, sīlaṁ samādiyati, uposathakammaṁ karoti.
patthana1.6:51.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:51.1_3: patthanaṁ upanissāya maggaṁ uppādeti, phalasamāpattiṁ samāpajjati.
patthana1.6:52.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.6:52.1_2: samāpattiṁ uppādeti. Sīlaṁ … sutaṁ … cāgaṁ … paññaṁ …
patthana1.6:52.1_10: kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:53.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.6:54.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.6:55.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.6:56.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.6:56.1_1: **Pakatūpanissayo**—ariyā maggaṁ upanissāya anuppannaṁ samāpattiṁ uppādenti, uppannaṁ samāpattiṁ samāpajjanti, saṅkhāre aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti.
patthana1.6:57.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
patthana1.6:57.1_1: **Ārammaṇapurejātaṁ**—cakkhuṁ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati; sotaṁ … ghānaṁ … jivhaṁ … kāyaṁ … rūpe … sadde … gandhe … rase …
patthana1.6:57.1_3: vatthuṁ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti.
patthana1.6:58.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
patthana1.6:59.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—vatthu asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikānaṁ khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:60.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo—pacchājātā saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:61.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo—pacchājātā asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:62.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo—pacchājātā asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:63.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikānaṁ khandhānaṁ āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:64.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā …pe…
patthana1.6:65.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—gotrabhu maggassa …
patthana1.6:66.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:67.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana1.6:67.1_2: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:68.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa ca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:69.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana1.6:69.1_1: **Sahajātā**—asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:69.1_3: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:70.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana1.6:70.1_2: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikā kusalā cetanā vipākānaṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:71.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:72.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa ca asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:73.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo—vipāko asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ vipākapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.6:73.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ vipākapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.6:74.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo—vipāko asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ vipākapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.6:75.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo—vipākā asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ vipākapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:76.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa ca asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa ca dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo—vipāko asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ vipākapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.6:77.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana1.6:78.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā āhārā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:78.1_2: kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:79.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana1.6:80.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana1.6:81.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo—asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā indriyā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo;
patthana1.6:83.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa jhānapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.6:84.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana1.6:84.1_2: **Pacchājātā**—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:85.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana1.6:85.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā khandhā kaṭattārūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:85.1_8: **Pacchājātā**—asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:86.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:87.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:88.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana1.6:88.1_2: **Pacchājātā**—asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:89.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:90.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana1.6:90.1_2: **Pacchājātā**—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:91.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa ca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.6:92.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana1.6:92.1_1: **Sahajāto**—asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.6:92.1_3: asaññasattānaṁ ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ tiṇṇannaṁ mahābhūtānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.6:92.1_8: vatthuṁ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti.
patthana1.6:92.1_14: **Pacchājātā**—asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:93.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:94.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:95.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo ….
patthana1.6:96.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana1.6:96.1_2: **Pacchājātā**—asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:97.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa ca asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo ….
patthana1.6:98.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko ca dhammā asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana1.6:98.1_1: **Sahajātā**—asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:98.1_2: **Pacchājātā**—asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikā khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:98.1_3: **Pacchājātā**—asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:99.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko ca dhammā asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana1.6:99.1_1: **Sahajāto**—asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe….
patthana1.6:100.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca dhammā saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana1.6:100.1_1: **Sahajāto**—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.6:101.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca dhammā asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana1.6:101.1_1: **Sahajātā**—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:101.1_2: **Pacchājātā**—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:101.1_3: **Pacchājātā**—saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:102.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa natthipaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.6:103.1_0: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā aṭṭha, anantare satta, samanantare satta, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye terasa, upanissaye aṭṭha, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme satta, vipāke cattāri, āhāre satta, indriye satta, jhāne satta, magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā terasa, natthiyā satta, vigate satta, avigate terasa.
patthana1.6:104.1_0: Hetupaccayā adhipatiyā cattāri, sahajāte satta, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye satta, vipāke cattāri, indriye cattāri, magge cattāri, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā satta, avigate satta.
patthana1.6:105.1_0: Hetu sahajāta nissaya atthi avigatanti satta.
patthana1.6:105.1_1: Hetu sahajāta aññamañña nissaya atthi avigatanti tīṇi.
patthana1.6:105.1_2: Hetu sahajāta aññamañña nissaya sampayutta atthi avigatanti tīṇi.
patthana1.6:105.1_3: Hetu sahajāta nissaya vippayutta atthi avigatanti tīṇi.
patthana1.6:106.1_0: Hetu sahajāta nissaya vipāka atthi avigatanti cattāri.
patthana1.6:106.1_1: Hetu sahajāta aññamañña nissaya vipāka atthi avigatanti dve.
patthana1.6:106.1_2: Hetu sahajāta aññamañña nissaya vipāka sampayutta atthi avigatanti dve.
patthana1.6:106.1_3: Hetu sahajāta nissaya vipāka vippayutta atthi avigatanti dve.
patthana1.6:106.1_4: Hetu sahajāta aññamañña nissaya vipāka vippayutta atthi avigatanti ekaṁ.
patthana1.6:108.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.6:109.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.6:110.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:111.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa ca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:112.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.6:113.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.6:114.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.6:115.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.6:116.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.6:117.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa ca asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:118.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko ca dhammā asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana1.6:119.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko ca dhammā asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana1.6:120.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca dhammā saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana1.6:121.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca dhammā asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana1.6:122.1_0: Nahetuyā cuddasa, naārammaṇe cuddasa, naadhipatiyā cuddasa, naanantare cuddasa, nasamanantare cuddasa, nasahajāte dasa, naaññamaññe dasa, nanissaye dasa, naupanissaye terasa, napurejāte dvādasa, napacchājāte cuddasa, naāsevane cuddasa, nakamme cuddasa, navipāke cuddasa, naāhāre cuddasa, naindriye cuddasa, najhāne cuddasa, namagge cuddasa, nasampayutte dasa, navippayutte aṭṭha, noatthiyā aṭṭha, nonatthiyā cuddasa, novigate cuddasa, noavigate aṭṭha.
patthana1.6:125.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare satta, nasamanantare satta, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte satta, naāsevane satta, nakamme satta, navipāke satta, naāhāre satta, naindriye satta, najhāne satta, namagge satta, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta.
patthana1.6:126.1_0: Hetu sahajāta nissaya atthi avigatanti naārammaṇe satta …pe…
patthana1.6:129.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā aṭṭha, anantare satta, samanantare satta, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye terasa, upanissaye aṭṭha, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme satta, vipāke cattāri, āhāre satta, indriye satta, jhāne satta, magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā terasa, natthiyā satta, vigate satta, avigate terasa.
